CustomField.description: This will display an image of the type of run/walk that was completed.
CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(Run_Type__c) == "Treadmill Run"),IMAGE("https://akeemadkins-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153t000003J4eM", "Treadmill Run", 100, 150), IF((TEXT(Run_Type__c) == "Treadmill Walk"),IMAGE("https://akeemadkins-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153t000003J4eb", "Treadmill Walk", 100, 150), IF((TEXT(Run_Type__c) == "Neighborhood Run"),IMAGE("https://akeemadkins-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153t000003J4e7", "Neighborhood Run", 100, 150), IF((TEXT(Run_Type__c) == "Neighborhood Walk"),IMAGE("https://akeemadkins-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153t000003J4eC", "Treadmill Walk", 100, 150),""))))
CustomField.label: Type of Run/Walk
